Package lib.homies.framework.cooldown

Interface CooldownService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCooldownService
public interface CooldownService
A platform-agnostic service for managing time-based cooldowns for players. Framework developers can use this to implement delays for abilities, commands, etc.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<Long>
    getRemainingCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key, TimeUnit unit)
    Gets the remaining cooldown time for a specific key for a player.
    boolean
    isOnCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key)
    Checks if a specific key is currently on cooldown for a given player.
    void
    removeCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key)
    Removes an active cooldown for a specific key for a player.
    void
    setCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key, long duration, TimeUnit unit)
    Puts a specific key on cooldown for a player for a given duration.

  • Method Details

    • isOnCooldown

      boolean isOnCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key)
      Checks if a specific key is currently on cooldown for a given player.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to check.
      key - A unique string identifier for the cooldown (e.g., "teleport_command", "special_ability").
      Returns:
      true if the key is still on cooldown for the player, false otherwise.

    • setCooldown

      void setCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key, long duration, TimeUnit unit)
      Puts a specific key on cooldown for a player for a given duration. If the player already has a cooldown for this key, it will be reset to the new duration.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to apply the cooldown to.
      key - A unique string identifier for the cooldown.
      duration - The length of the cooldown.
      unit - The TimeUnit for the duration (e.g., TimeUnit.SECONDS, TimeUnit.MINUTES).

    • getRemainingCooldown

      Optional<Long> getRemainingCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key, TimeUnit unit)
      Gets the remaining cooldown time for a specific key for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to check.
      key - A unique string identifier for the cooldown.
      unit - The TimeUnit in which the remaining time should be returned.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the remaining duration in the specified time unit if the key is on cooldown, or Optional.empty() if not on cooldown or if the cooldown has expired.

    • removeCooldown

      void removeCooldown(HomiesPlayer player, String key)
      Removes an active cooldown for a specific key for a player. If no such cooldown exists, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer whose cooldown should be removed.
      key - The unique string identifier for the cooldown to remove.
